TopicTitle: Transfer science to lab with antenna?

Articles.Content: Hi, when i get science points, i want to send it to my lab, but i don't want to fly to it, cause it's far, i want to send the science with the antenna. Is it possible with mods? No options on vanilla KSP 1.12.5.

Science are represented as “physical” packets. They are also stored in their specific part (e.g. command module, MPL, Kerbal, experiment part). So even within the same ship a Kerbal will need to EVA to move collected science around.
In short, no, you cannot with stock (vanilla).
